hero.description: Software Developer with a strong focus on back-end development. Working with Nest.js, TypeScript, MongoDB, PostgreSQL and Vue.js to build scalable applications. Passionate about clean code principles, design patterns, and automation.

api.title: API Development
api.description: Building robust and scalable RESTful APIs using Node.js, TypeScript, and Nest.js framework.

frontend.title: Frontend Solutions
frontend.description: Creating interactive and responsive user interfaces with Vue.js ecosystem: Nuxt.js and Quasar.

architecture.title: Architecture
architecture.description: Understanding and applying Microservices, Monolithic, and Clean Architecture principles.

quality.title: Code Quality
quality.description: Implementing unit testing with Vitest and applying SOLID design patterns for maintainable code.

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: Exploring workflow automation with n8n, MCP, RAG, and vector databases for modern solutions.

vortia.title: Vortia - Commercial Website
vortia.description: Professional website developed under formal contract using Nuxt.js. Collaborated with client through Jira for design implementation and view creation.

rappi.title: Rappi Clone - Full Stack Application
rappi.description: Food delivery platform simulation with strong focus on backend architecture. Built with a team of 4 using DDD (Hexagonal/Clean Architecture), SOLID principles, and design patterns.

pokemon.title: Who Is That Pokémon?
pokemon.description: Interactive game where users identify Pokémon from silhouettes. Features 4 multiple-choice options and real-time data from PokéAPI.

chat.title: Project Chat API
chat.description: Simple chat application that interacts with an external API providing binary 'yes' or 'no' responses with relevant GIFs, activated only for questions.

marathon.title: Marathon System - Full Stack
marathon.description: University project for registering runner's best times across different cities. Complete CRUD application with city-runner relationship management.

job.title: Software Developer
highlights: Designed and implemented RESTful APIs using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB for property management systems, handling complex data models with over 4,000 records
Automated rental receipt generation and delivery process using n8n integration, achieving 100% elimination of manual workflows and zero human errors
Developed responsive front-end interface with Vue.js and Quasar Framework, consuming custom-built backend APIs to deliver an interactive user experience
Managed application deployment and maintenance on Railway platform, ensuring high availability and continuous system performance

contact.title: Get In
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your visions. Feel free to reach out!
